items.sentence: Give Tom a call and tell him what time you'll be there.
Good sunglasses protect the eyes from ultraviolet rays.
I'm thinking about what I'll tell you when I get there.
Tom paints Easter eggs with his grandmother every year.
Tom lives in a three-room apartment in downtown Boston.
Tom has been secretly in love with Mary for many years.
Tatoeba: Join the dark side. We have chocolate cookies.
Once you walk through the gates, you'll see the garden.
Some people think that it's bad luck to kill a cricket.
You've been candid with me, so I'll be candid with you.
